sqlMap.select:
SELECT ZC_BAL_ID, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_ACC_NAME, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_CO_BANK_CODE, ZC_CO_BANK_NAME, ZC_CO_ACC_NAME, ZC_CO_ACC_CODE, ZC_BAL_STATUS, ZC_BAL_SUM, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_BAL_APP, ZC_BAL_APP_DATE, ZC_BAL_AUT, ZC_BAL_AUT_DATE, ZC_BAL_APF_NO, ZC_BAL_FLAG, ZC_IS_RTN, ZC_BID_CODE, ORG_CODE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_MAKE_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_YSJG_NA, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_BAL_TYPE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_INVOICE_CODE, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_REMARK, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, PAYTYPE_CODE, OUTLAY_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_CO_TYPE, ZC_INPUT_NAME, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_HT_NUM, (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME, (select ht.ZC_HT_NAME from ZC_XMCG_HT ht where ht.zc_ht_code = master.zc_ht_code) as ZC_HT_NAME, PAY_ORDER, IS_LAST_PAY FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL master where 1=1
exists (select instance_id from v_wf_current_task_gk53 where executor =#executor# and instance_id = master.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = master.process_inst_id) and master.ZC_BAL_STATUS!='cancel' and master.ZC_BAL_STATUS!='exec' and master.ZC_BAL_STATUS!='sendGk'
(master.ZC_BAL_STATUS in ('exec','sendGk'))
exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=master.process_inst_id) or master.process_inst_id = -1
1=1
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and instance_id = master.process_inst_id)
master.ZC_BAL_STATUS ='exec' and exists ( select bi.zc_bal_id from zc_p_pro_bal_bi bi where bi.zc_am_billno is null and bi.zc_bi_no is not null and zc_bal_id=master.zc_bal_id)
master.ZC_BAL_STATUS='sendGk'
master.ND = #nd#
order by ZC_INPUT_NAME DESC

SELECT ZC_BAL_ID, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_NAME, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_CO_ACC_CODE, ZC_CO_ACC_NAME, ZC_CO_BANK_CODE, ZC_CO_BANK_NAME, ZC_BAL_STATUS, ZC_BAL_SUM, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_INPUT_NAME, ZC_BAL_APP, ZC_BAL_APP_DATE, ZC_BAL_AUT, ZC_BAL_AUT_DATE, ZC_BAL_APF_NO, ZC_BAL_FLAG, ZC_IS_RTN, ZC_BID_CODE, ORG_CODE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_MAKE_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_YSJG_NA, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_BAL_TYPE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_INVOICE_CODE, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_REMARK, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, PAYTYPE_CODE, OUTLAY_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_CO_TYPE, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_HT_NUM, (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME, (select ht.ZC_HT_NAME from ZC_XMCG_HT ht where ht.zc_ht_code = master.zc_ht_code) as ZC_HT_NAME, PAY_ORDER, IS_LAST_PAY FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL master WHERE master.ZC_BAL_ID=#zcBalid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_P_PRO_BAL (ZC_BAL_ID, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_NAME, ZC_CO_BANK_CODE, ZC_CO_BANK_NAME, ZC_CO_ACC_CODE, ZC_CO_ACC_NAME, ZC_BAL_STATUS, ZC_BAL_SUM, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_INPUT_NAME, ZC_BAL_APP, ZC_BAL_APP_DATE, ZC_BAL_AUT, ZC_BAL_AUT_DATE, ZC_BAL_APF_NO, ZC_BAL_FLAG, ZC_IS_RTN, ZC_BID_CODE, ORG_CODE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_MAKE_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_YSJG_NA, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_BAL_TYPE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_INVOICE_CODE, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_REMARK, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, PAYTYPE_CODE, OUTLAY_CODE, ZC_BI_SUM, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_CO_TYPE, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_HT_NUM, PAY_ORDER, IS_LAST_PAY) values (#zcBalId:VARCHAR#, #zcSuBankCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuBankName:VARCHAR#, #zcSuAccCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuAccName:VARCHAR#, #zcCoBankCode:VARCHAR#, #zcCoBankName:VARCHAR#, #zcCoAccCode:VARCHAR#, #zcCoAccName:VARCHAR#, #zcBalStatus:VARCHAR#, #zcBalSum:DECIMAL#, #zcInputCode:VARCHAR#, #zcInputDate:VARCHAR#, #zcInputName:VARCHAR#, #zcBalApp:VARCHAR#, #zcBalAppDate:VARCHAR#, #zcBalAut:VARCHAR#, #zcBalAutDate:VARCHAR#, #zcBalApfNo:VARCHAR#, #zcBalFlag:VARCHAR#, #zcIsRin:VARCHAR#, #zcBidCode:VARCHAR#, #orgCode:VARCHAR#, #processInstId:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #nd:VARCHAR#, #zcYsjgNa:VARCHAR#, #zcReqCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuName:VARCHAR#, #zcBalType:VARCHAR#, #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuTel:VARCHAR#, #zcSuLinkMan:VARCHAR#, #zcHangyeCtg:VARCHAR#, #zcInvoiceCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSkRen:VARCHAR#, #zcRemark:VARCHAR#, #zcZbName:VARCHAR#, #zcZbCode:VARCHAR#, #payTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #outLayCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBiSum:VARCHAR#, #zcBiNo:VARCHAR#, #zcCoType:VARCHAR#, #zcMoneyBiSum:VARCHAR#, #zcHtNum:VARCHAR#, #payOrder:VARCHAR#, #isLastPay:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update:
update ZC_P_PRO_BAL Set ZC_SU_BANK_CODE = #zcSuBankCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME = #zcSuBankName:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE = #zcSuAccCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_ACC_NAME = #zcSuAccName:VARCHAR#, ZC_CO_BANK_CODE = #zcCoBankCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CO_BANK_NAME = #zcCoBankName:VARCHAR#, ZC_CO_ACC_CODE = #zcCoAccCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CO_ACC_NAME = #zcCoAccName:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_STATUS = #zcBalStatus:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_SUM = #zcBalSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_INPUT_CODE = #zcInputCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_INPUT_DATE = #zcInputDate:VARCHAR#, ZC_INPUT_NAME = #zcInputName:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_APP = #zcBalApp:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_APP_DATE = #zcBalAppDate:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_AUT = #zcBalAut:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_AUT_DATE = #zcBalAutDate:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_APF_NO = #zcBalApfNo:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_FLAG = #zcBalFlag:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_RTN = #zcIsRin:VARCHAR#, ZC_BID_CODE = #zcBidCode:VARCHAR#, ORG_CODE = #orgCode:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#, ND = #nd:VARCHAR#, ZC_YSJG_NA = #zcYsjgNa:VARCHAR#, ZC_REQ_CODE = #zcReqCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_CODE = #zcSuCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_NAME = #zcSuName:VARCHAR#, ZC_BAL_TYPE = #zcBalType:VARCHAR#, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA = #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_TEL = #zcSuTel:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_LINKMAN = #zcSuLinkMan:VARCHAR#, ZC_HANGYE_CTG = #zcHangyeCtg:VARCHAR#, ZC_INVOICE_CODE = #zcInvoiceCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SK_REN = #zcSkRen:VARCHAR#, ZC_REMARK = #zcRemark:VARCHAR#, ZC_ZB_NAME = #zcZbName:VARCHAR#, ZC_ZB_CODE = #zcZbCode:VARCHAR#, PAYTYPE_CODE = #payTypeCode:VARCHAR#, OUTLAY_CODE = #outLayCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_BI_SUM = #zcBiSum:VARCHAR#, ZC_BI_NO = #zcBiNo:VARCHAR#, ZC_CO_TYPE = #zcCoType:VARCHAR#, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM = #zcMoneyBiSum:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_NUM = #zcHtNum:VARCHAR#, PAY_ORDER = #payOrder:VARCHAR#, IS_LAST_PAY = #isLastPay:VARCHAR#
WHERE ZC_BAL_ID = #zcBalId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT sum(ZC_BAL_SUM) FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL WHERE ZC_BAL_STATUS!='cancel' AND ZC_MAKE_CODE=#zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# AND ZC_HT_CODE=#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_BAL_ID!=#balId#

select nvl(sum(bi.zc_bi_jhua_sum), 0) - nvl(sum(zc_bi_bcjs_sum), 0) from (select zc_make_code,sum(zc_bi_jhua_sum) zc_bi_jhua_sum from (select mb.zc_make_code, mb.zc_bi_jhua_sum from zc_p_pro_mitem_bi mb where zc_make_code = #makeCode:VARCHAR# and mb.zc_bi_no is not null union all (select ht.zc_make_code, sum(hb.zc_bi_bcsy_sum) from zc_xmcg_ht_bi hb, zc_xmcg_ht ht where hb.zc_ht_code = ht.zc_ht_code and ht.zc_make_code = #makeCode:VARCHAR# and ht.zc_parht_code is not null and ht.zc_ht_status = 'exec' and hb.zc_bi_no is not null group by ht.zc_make_code)) group by zc_make_code) bi, (select ba.zc_make_code, sum(bb.zc_bi_bcjs_sum) zc_bi_bcjs_sum from zc_p_pro_bal_bi bb, zc_p_pro_bal ba where bb.zc_bal_id = ba.zc_bal_id and ba.zc_make_code = #makeCode:VARCHAR# and bb.zc_bal_id != #balId:VARCHAR# and bb.zc_bi_no is not null group by ba.zc_make_code) bbi where bi.zc_make_code = bbi.zc_make_code(+)

select mk.zc_bi_no, zc_bi_jhua_sum - nvl(zc_bi_bcjs_sum, 0) zc_bi_bal, mk.senddoc_name, mk.paytype_code from (select zc_bi_no, nvl(sum(zc_bi_jhua_sum), 0) zc_bi_jhua_sum, senddoc_name, paytype_code from (select zc_make_code, zc_bi_no, zc_bi_jhua_sum, senddoc_name, paytype_code from Zc_p_Pro_Mitem_Bi where zc_make_code = #makeCode:VARCHAR# and zc_bi_no is not null union all select ht.zc_make_code, zc_bi_no, hb.zc_bi_bcsy_sum zc_bi_jhua_sum, senddoc_name, paytype_code from zc_xmcg_ht_bi hb, zc_xmcg_ht ht where hb.zc_ht_code = ht.zc_ht_code and ht.zc_make_code = #makeCode:VARCHAR# and ht.zc_parht_code is not null and ht.zc_ht_status = 'exec' and hb.zc_bi_no is not null) group by zc_bi_no, senddoc_name, paytype_code) mk, (select bi.zc_bi_no, nvl(sum(bi.zc_bi_bcjs_sum), 0) zc_bi_bcjs_sum from zc_p_pro_bal bal, zc_p_pro_bal_bi bi where bal.zc_bal_id != #balId:VARCHAR# and bal.zc_make_code = #makeCode:VARCHAR# and bi.zc_bal_id = bal.zc_bal_id and bi.zc_bi_no is not null and bi.zc_am_billno is not null group by bi.zc_bi_no) bb where bb.zc_bi_no(+) = mk.zc_bi_no and mk.zc_bi_no is not null and zc_bi_jhua_sum > nvl(zc_bi_bcjs_sum, 0)
select count(*) from zc_p_pro_bal bal where bal.zc_bal_id != #balId:VARCHAR# and bal.zc_make_code = #makeCode:VARCHAR# and bal.zc_bal_status not in ('sendGk','exec')
sqlMap.update: update ZC_P_PRO_BAL Set ZC_BAL_STATUS = #zcBalStatus:VARCHAR# WHERE ZC_BAL_ID = #zcBalId:VARCHAR#
